name: vue-desktop-framework
description: A framework for making hybrid desktop app powered by electron and vue.

scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=PRODUCTION && webpack --progress --config webpack.release.config.js && electron-packager . App --plantform=win32 --out=./package --ignore=node_modules/electron-* --arch=ia32 --prune --ignore=app/src --ignore=docs --ignore=.git --ignore=README.md --ignore=debug.log --ignore=LICENSE --ignore=.eslintrc --ignore=.gitignore --ignore=webpack.config.js --ignore=webpack.release.config.js --ignore=.vscode --overwrite --asar=true --download.mirror=https://npm.taobao.org/mirrors/electron/

author: Zijin Xiao <ZijinX@outlook.com>
